script.name: Lib.Gen.Anarkis.Pirate.Promote.Base
script.description: Pirate Guild - Upgrade a PB to the guild

line.comment: * Converts a standard Pirate Base to a Pirate Guild Base
* Added (Nicoman35): Pirate Bases are able to use ADS
* Added (Nicoman35): Convert already owned lasertowers into pirate guild lasertowers
* Save initial name, rename the base to "Pirate Guild Outpost"
* Create fighters now if this is not an Import startup
* Add Ships (number dependent on difficulty setting)
* Change 'Signal Attacked' by the PG version.

line.text: '%s has been promoted to %s%s, relation to player: %s Built ships: %s'

line.comment: * Convert already owned lasertowers into pirate guild lasertowers
* Save initial name, rename lasertower to "Pirate Guild Lasertower"

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Upgrade a PB to the guild
%s has been promoted to %s%s, relation to player: %s Built ships: %s
Converts a standard Pirate Base to a Pirate Guild Base
Added (Nicoman35): Pirate Bases are able to use ADS
Added (Nicoman35): Convert already owned lasertowers into pirate guild lasertowers
Save initial name, rename the base to "Pirate Guild Outpost"
Create fighters now if this is not an Import startup
Add Ships (number dependent on difficulty setting)
Change 'Signal Attacked' by the PG version.
Convert already owned lasertowers into pirate guild lasertowers
Save initial name, rename lasertower to "Pirate Guild Lasertower"
